overview: Faton and Fatlind are some of the many children of the martyrs of freedom in our country. Coming from a family that gave Kosovo soldiers for 4 generations in a row, Fatlind continues the tradition by serving in the Kosovo Army, but always looking up to his martyred father. Special thanks to the Haxhaj Family, particularly to Xhemajli Haxhaj, the father of Haxhi Haxhaj martyr.
title: Father’s Path
